definitions: in a manner that is not regular or consistent

examples.text: a staircase with unevenly spaced steps
Milo was lying on his back, breathing unevenly

shortDefinitions: in manner that is not regular or consistent

definitions: in a way that is not equally balanced or distributed

examples.text: opportunities were unevenly spread around the country

shortDefinitions: in way that is not equally balanced or distributed

definitions: in a way that is not level or smooth

examples.text: the former front garden has been unevenly concreted

shortDefinitions: in way that is not level or smooth
